alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Gove; Graham; Logan; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 26 at 7:02AM CDT until July 26 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Patchy dense fog. * WHERE...In Kansas, Rawlins, Decatur, Sheridan, Thomas, Norton, Graham, Logan and Gove Counties. In Nebraska, Red Willow and Hitchcock Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At 635 AM CDT, an automated observation site in Colby reported one quarter mile visibility associated with dense fog. Locally dense fog can be expected along Interstate 70 between Quinter and Colby.
info.instruction: Drivers are urged to slow down and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway on-ramps and off-ramps where accidents are more likely to occur. Use low beam headlights and be prepared for rapid reductions in visibility, especially near rivers, creeks and other low lying areas.

area.areaDesc: Decatur; Gove; Graham; Logan; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas
